header: Sorry for the delayed newsletter. At least you get a rather fat edition and I have not even included most of the Perl 6 related articles. For those check out the Perl 6 Weekly.

You might have already read that I am writing a book about Web application development in Perl 6 and I am crowdfunding it. There are already more than 80 people supporting it, but I was hoping to have more. A lot more. There are more than 6,000 people reading the Perl Weekly. I was hoping at least a 1,000 of you will support it.

Not only for the money, but in order to show everyone else you believe in Perl 6, and you trust me to write you a good book. Or, if you don't care about Perl 6, you could just say: heck this is myway to thank Gabor for running the Perl Weekly for 6 years. Either way, please support it now!
subject: Perl 5.26.0 is now available!
